snippet: The Iowa caucus process requires a significant investment from voters and a high level of organization from the campaigns.
abstract: The Iowa caucus process requires a significant investment from voters and a high level of organization from the campaigns.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES - Iowa voters will kick off the Republican presidential voting on Tuesday. But logistically, there is much more to it than that.

headline.main: On Caucus Night, a Time Commitment
